safetyTips: The idea behind offering a door to door delivery service for our local community is to compliment the government's advice to stay home. Our brewery on Harcourt Road in Brockley is small and in an effort to keep social interactions to an absolute minimum, we're operating on a skeleton crew and not permitting any access to the public.
name: Brockley Brewery
description: This local brewery is offering delivery of cans, bottles, mini-kegs, and 2 and 4 pint cartons. Their contactless beer delivery is available to all residents of Southwark and Lewisham for just Â£2 - or for free if you live in SE4, 12 or 13. Order by 11:00 for delivery by 19:00 the same day.
